Date Quantity Action
{{item.date | date:"shortDate"}} {{item.quantity}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { CartService } from 'src/app/service/cart.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-cart', templateUrl: './cart.component.html', styleUrls: ['./cart.component.css'] }) export class CartComponent implements OnInit { constructor( private service : CartService) { } carts:any[]= []; ngOnInit() : void { this.getAllCarts() } getAllCarts(){ this.service.getAllCarts().subscribe((res:any)=> { this.carts = res }) } }
